reviewText: I love movies. This is a great child's movie. I have it on vhs we are trying to convert all vhs to dvds. you sold this for a very fair price.thank you
Title: Inspector Gadget/Inspector Gadget 2 2-Movie Collection

reviewText: I haven't seen the first movie in 14 years so I thought I'd do myself a favor and get this DVD, I saw the second one on Netflix last night and it was just as hilarious as I remember the first one. Both movies are equally great in two different ways, the second one is more over the top than the first one but it didn't make the movie any less funny, the first one has more story but is still funny. I still enjoy watching Inspector Gadget even as an adult.
Title: Inspector Gadget/Inspector Gadget 2 2-Movie Collection

reviewText: I remember watching Inspector Gadget when I was little and was excited when my little ones wanted to watch it. Bought it for the longest time that was the only thing my youngest one wanted to watch. They still watch it like they have never seen it before.
Title: Inspector Gadget/Inspector Gadget 2 2-Movie Collection

reviewText: This was a gift because my nephew loves these movies. They are funny , laugh out loud and good for all ages.
Title: Inspector Gadget/Inspector Gadget 2 2-Movie Collection

reviewText: This was bought as a gift for someone else and she liked it, so it is good enough for me! It was bought more so as a gag but it turned out to be a super gift.
Title: Inspector Gadget/Inspector Gadget 2 2-Movie Collection

reviewText: As a fan of the original cartoons, I decided to give this a try. I also like both of these actors and wanted to see how the concept would translate to live action. Absolutely loved both of them.
Title: Inspector Gadget/Inspector Gadget 2 2-Movie Collection

reviewText: I bought these for my 10 yr. old grandson and he loves them. We watched them together on family movie night.
Title: Inspector Gadget/Inspector Gadget 2 2-Movie Collection
